commentable.description: Indicates whether comments are allowed on the blog.

created_at.description: The date and time when the blog was created.

feedburner.description: The Feedburner date for the blog.

feedburner_location.description: The location information related to Feedburner.

handle.description: The unique handle used in the blog's URL.

id.description: The unique identifier for the blog.

template_suffix.description: The template suffix used in the blog's layout.

updated_at.description: The date and time when the blog was last updated.

admin_graphql_api_id.description: The unique identifier for the blog within the admin GraphQL API.

shop_url.description: The URL of the shop associated with the blog.

deleted_at.description: The date and time when the blog was deleted, if applicable.

deleted_message.description: A message associated with the deletion of the blog.

deleted_description.description: A description of the reason for deleting the blog.
